game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A map leads you to a forgotten temple deep in the jungle. Your mission is to explore the temple, overcome its challenges, and recover the lost artifact.
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a magical relic

task.description: Locate the entrance to the temple hidden among the dense vegetation.
task.location: Jungle clearing, north of the village

task.description: Solve the puzzles on the temple walls to unlock the inner chamber.
Defeat the ancient protector of the artifact and claim your reward.
task.location: Final chamber, deepest part of the temple
